title: SPOC_INTEGRATION - DISABLE SECLI JOBS/ISOLATION on PROD-Like

task_list.instruction_title:
To send 

Please PUT ON HOLD AND DO NOT EXECUTE the SECLI Batch jobs (Except MIFID & EMIR) from Friday until Sunday on CSD Weekend 1, on PROD-Like




The Thursday EOD PROD BANK Batch for SECLI part should have been run as expected.
